statements.query: MATCH (:OktaOrganization{id: {OKTA_ORG_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(:OktaGroup)<-[r:MEMBER_OF_OKTA_GROUP]-(:OktaUser) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete stale OktaUser relationship to OktaGroup

statements.query: MATCH (:OktaOrganization{id: {OKTA_ORG_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:OktaGroup) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
